- [ Accelerate ](/documentation/accelerate)

Type Alias# COMPLEX_SPLIT

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
typealias COMPLEX_SPLIT = DSPSplitComplex
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Accelerate/COMPLEX_SPLIT#see-also)

### [Data types](/documentation/Accelerate/COMPLEX_SPLIT#Data-types)

[`typealias vDSP_Length`](/documentation/accelerate/vdsp_length)An unsigned-integer value that represents the size of vectors and the indices of elements in vectors.[`typealias vDSP_Stride`](/documentation/accelerate/vdsp_stride)An integer value that represents the differences between indices of elements, including the lengths of strides.[`struct DSPComplex`](/documentation/accelerate/dspcomplex)A structure that represents a single-precision complex value.[`struct DSPDoubleComplex`](/documentation/accelerate/dspdoublecomplex)A structure that represents a double-precision complex value.[`typealias DOUBLE_COMPLEX_SPLIT`](/documentation/accelerate/double_complex_split)[`struct DSPSplitComplex`](/documentation/accelerate/dspsplitcomplex)A structure that represents a single-precision complex vector with the real and imaginary parts stored in separate arrays.[`struct DSPDoubleSplitComplex`](/documentation/accelerate/dspdoublesplitcomplex)A structure that represents a double-precision complex vector with the real and imaginary parts stored in separate arrays.[`struct VectorizableDouble`](/documentation/accelerate/vdsp/vectorizabledouble)A structure that represents a double-precision real value for biquadratic filtering and discrete Fourier transforms.[`struct VectorizableFloat`](/documentation/accelerate/vdsp/vectorizablefloat)A structure that represents a single-precision real value for biquadratic filtering and discrete Fourier transforms.
